properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; St Ignace to False Detour Channel; Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 5 at 3:05AM EST until January 6 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 40 kt and highest waves around 8
feet expected.

* WHERE...Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge
including Mackinac Island, St Ignace to False Detour Channel,
5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including
Bois Blanc Island and Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI
Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous highest waves
which could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST MONDAY
